name: DoodleTown
description:
After a frustrated Artist scraps his idea and throws away his sketches, the little doodle town is in shambles. Hereafter, you play as a little stickman named Cross wanting to repair his village by doing favors for the other villagers and restoring faith in what's left.

Controlls

______________________________________________________________

Caution: This game has no save states. If you wanna enjoy it without losing progress, do it in one playthrough and don't exit into the Main Menu while playing.
